Hello, all!

Just had to make sure the internet is still working.  I don't know the real difference between "neutral" and "open" in this context just yet, so I'm just conducting a little research (which basically consists of me [expletive deleted] around online to see if everything still works like it did yesterday).

Have a nice, new internet, everyone!
